sense.gloss: gorgeous, brilliant, dazzling, ornate, gaudy, flowery

sdata.j: ジムは↑職権↑↓しょっ|けん↓↑乱用↑↓らん|よう↓で↑免職↑↓めんしょく↓になった。
sdata.e: Jim got dismissed for his misconduct in office.

sdata.j: あの↑政治↑↓せいじ↓↑家↑↓か↓は↑職権↑↓しょっ|けん↓↑乱用↑↓らん|よう↓で↑国民↑↓こくみん↓の↑反感↑↓はんかん↓を↑買↑↓か↓った。
sdata.e: That politician attracted the antipathy of the public through their abuse of public office.
